subject: Basketball
College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: Mario Chalmers had eight of Kansas’s tournament-record 15 three-pointers, helping the No. 5 Jayhawks down No. 6 Texas.
snippet: Mario Chalmers had eight of Kansas’s tournament-record 15 three-pointers, helping the No. 5 Jayhawks down No. 6 Texas.
